channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Series of deep potholes at junction between Carlton Street and Priory Street, 14th January
item.description:
Not sure how long they've been here. Potentially dangerous for people on motorcyles and bicycles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Friars, 9 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on wall, 13th January
item.description:
Graffiti on the wall next to the river. Behind DW sports opposite new build flats / houses at the end of Arle Avenue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 57 Arle Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drin on the kerbside outside 15/17 Hatherley Ct Road is seriously blocked, 13th January
item.description:
I couldn't unblock it!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Hatherley Court Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The gully is blocked and there is a build up of sodden leaves and slush on the pavement from Hanover Ct to the junction with Andover Rd. The kerbside is full of sodden leaves too., 13th January
item.description:
Veyr dangerous as there are so many elderly residents in this area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hanover House Saint Stephen's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Runnings Road sign at junction with Kingsditch Lane, on the south-west side of Runnings Road., 12th January
item.description:
Runnings Road sign has become detached from the supports and is now leaning against the legs. The sign needs to be refixed before it is lost.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit P4 Kingsditch Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter, 12th January
item.description:
There is a large amount of litter and industrial refuse all the way up this road. It has been there since September.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Leckhampton Hill, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large holes and missing tarmac, 11th January
item.description:
Several large holes and tarmac missing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hulbert Crescent, Up Hatherley

item.title: Hole, 11th January
item.description:
Car hit a shocking hole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Le Petit Blanc Restaurant Promenade, Cheltenham

item.title: Damage to pavement on left side of Hewlett Road from roundabout opposite Mersey Road, 11th January
item.description:
Don't know how long the pavement has been like this. Looks like it has been there for a while

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 225a Hewlett Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Uneven and broken paving slabs near end of Eldon Road meeting Hales Road, 11th January
item.description:
Don't know how long these have been broken or uneven. Potential trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 66 Eldon Road, Cheltenham

item.description:
Don't know how long the damage has been there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 57 Eldon Road, Cheltenham

item.description:
I don't know how long the damage has been there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Rydal Eldon Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Series of small deep potholes in the middle of Eldon Road, 11th January
item.description:
Potholes and wear down the centre of Eldon Road. Not sure how long the damage has been there. Looks like it has been there for a while.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Eldon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes all the way along half of Eldon Road approaching from Hewlett Road, 11th January
item.description:
Series of small, deep potholes along half of Eldon Road (both sides) approaching from Hewlett Road. Dangerous especially for anyone travelling by bike/motorbike.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Eldon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad potholes all away along the top half of Eldon Road approaching from Hewlett Road, 11th January
item.description:
Deep potholes along the right side of Eldon Road approaching from Hewlett Road. Dangerous for anyone travelling by bike/motorbike especially

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Eldon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad wear and potholes at the top of Beechurst Avenue, 11th January
item.description:
Don't know how long the damage has been here for but it looks like it's been here a while. There's an especially deep, narrow pothole that could be dangerous for people on bikes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Eldon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain at corner of Eldon Road turning left onto Hewlett Road, 11th January
item.description:
Don't know how long it's been here for. It's the first drain you come to after turning out of Eldon Road onto Hewlett Road (on the left side of the road)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 141 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad cracks, lots of strong weeds, uneven surface of path from School Gate to back of Golden Vale and along path parallel to Golden Valley by-pass., 11th January
item.description:
This path has been deteriorating for years and each winter it gets worse as freezing conditions break up the surface where the weeds have invade the path further each year. Old tree roots have caused large cracks, broken tarmac and raised areas on surface of path, especially behind 20 Golden Vale.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 25 Golden Vale, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned shopping trolleys, 11th January
item.description:
Different trolleys keep being dumped here its dangerous to cars and other road users and is a health hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Lee Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Surface of road breaking up and pavements not good, 11th January
item.description:
While it is a small close parents park to go take children to the nearby school and people visiting the nearby post office park in the close. Elderly residents find it a problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 246 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
